moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Bc5 4. c3 Nf6: i don't like this move , what seems that black won a free pawn cost him to lose his castling right which i will in the next move  , better was 7...Bxd2+.8.Nxd2-d5 and so long ..... ,
moves.9... Kxf7 10. Qb3+ d5 11. Qxb4 Re8: black joins his Rook to the game and in the same time black wishes to make an illusion of castling  with the idea of Kg8 . an illusion castling it means that , even black (on this case) cant castle any more on both side , with maneuvering of the rook to e8 and Kg8 it make like black castled on the king side .
moves.13... c6 14. Rfe1 Qe7: black offering queen exchange ,butt some how i decided to decline this offer because of the blacks queen uncomfortable position and another problem for black after 14...Qe7?! is that , it puts its own piece under a pine .
moves.15. Qa4 Bf5 16. Ne5: black was anyway going to break the pine by retreating his queen to c7 or any place , so my idea was to close blacks E file and on the same time activet my knight to better position . if you notice the defrense between whites Ne5 and blacks Ne4 is that the black knight can easly destroy or devorse it by f3 , however , the white knight can stay on e5 as long as it wants and , that makes the white knight on e5 very effective piece .
moves.16... Qh4: bad move , this move doesnt do any thing . its very easy to avoid this threat .
moves.17. Nxe4 Bxe4 18. Re2 Qg5: blunder, the black queen puts it self to very dangerous spot which you will see next , a nice combination finishes the game for black .
moves.19. Rxe4: the idea of the quality scarifies its to open the diagonal a2-g8 for the white queen which unleash hell on the black king . and unfortunately for black he falls into this deadly trap . actually after 18....Qg5??.19.Rxe4!! black in lost position .
moves.19... dxe4 20. Qb3+: black sees the threat and he can do nothing about it , there for , black resigns . either he loses his queen after 20...Kh8.21.Nf7+and a fork on the queen on g5 and the king on h8 , or Black's king will be checkmate after 20...Kf8.21.Qf7#. thank you and i hope you enjoy the game .
